attributes.action: order a probe in the recent stabbing  to death of Sukhwinder Singh while chasing thieves who had snatched a woman's handbag in east London.We want justice.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
sukhwinder singh, 31, was attacked on Friday 8th january 2010 evening as he pursued two men who had mugged a 28-year-old woman near barking station. 

Mr singh, a builder, had chased the men along victoria Road, into uphall Road, where he was stabbed at about 1900 gmt

rejection.details: This is a matter for the police.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
